name: Amexio Rating
description: A simple configurable star rating component with visual feedback.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Number of stars for rating component.

properties.name: read-only
properties.description: If true will not react on any user events.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true will not react on any user events and show disable icon over

properties.name: full-icon
properties.description: Icon for selected rating and this attribute is useful only when user have custom rating icons.

properties.name: empty-icon
properties.description: Icon for non-selected rating and this attribute is useful only when user have custom rating icons

events.name: onLeave
events.description: fires on leaving component and returns its value
